targets.query: SELECT max("enqueued_time") FROM "zuul-queue-status" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "queue" = 'tripleo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "epoch" ORDER BY time DESC SLIMIT 1

alert.name: Upstream tripleo gate queue alert
alert.message: Upstream tripleo gate queue is older than 6 hours, check the jobs there http://zuul.openstack.org/.

targets.query: SELECT min("result_code") FROM "zuul-queue-status" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "queue" = 'tripleo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "epoch" SLIMIT 1

alert.name: Openstack zuul's result alarms alert
alert.message: Upstream tripleo gate jobs are failing, check them at sova: http://cistatus.tripleo.org/gates/, and also at zuul: zuul.openstack.org

alert.name: RDO alert
alert.message: RDO openstack-check pipeline has jobs that are older than 6 hours, check the jobs https://review.rdoproject.org/zuul/.

alert.name: RDO alert
alert.message: RDO openstack-check pipeline is failing a noop changes, check them at sova: http://cistatus.tripleo.org/promotion/, and also at zuul:  http://review.rdoproject.org/zuul

targets.query: SELECT max("enqueued_time") FROM "zuul-queue-status" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "queue" = 'tripleo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "epoch" ORDER BY time DESC

panels.title: Upstream job status
panels.content: To look for issue check [sova gate jobs](http://cistatus.tripleo.org/gate/) and [upstream zuul](http://zuul.opentsack.org)

targets.query: SELECT min("result_code") FROM "zuul-queue-status" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'gate' AND "queue" = 'tripleo') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "epoch" SLIMIT 1

panels.title: RDO job status
panels.content: To look for issue check [sova promotion jobs](http://cistatus.tripleo.org/promotion/) and [RDO zuul](http://review.rdoproject.org/zuul)

panels.title: Noop change $noop_review last result

targets.query: SELECT min("result_code"), "result" FROM "zuul-queue-status" WHERE  "pipeline" = 'openstack-check' AND "url" = 'https://review.rdoproject.org/zuul/status.json' AND "review"='$noop_review'  GROUP BY epoch

panels.description:
This is the last result from a noop change make to check that jobs are working fine.

[Gerrit link](http://review.openstack.org/$noop_review)

targets.query: SELECT "job", "result" FROM "zuul-queue-status" WHERE ("pipeline" = 'openstack-check' AND "url" = 'https://review.rdoproject.org/zuul/status.json' AND "review" =~ /^$noop_review$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "epoch" SLIMIT 1
